Text: I don't know who you are but you're my absolute favourite uploader in the world. Thanks alone aren't really enough for all this I don't think.

What a jolly spiffing torrent, absolutely top hole dear chap!

Ah, the dulcet tones of the Butthole Surfers, such an eloquent reminder of hazy days long gone by - Of Endless summers filled with Pink Panthers, Black Microdots, Sulphate, Evo & Merrydown. By George, those were the days...
This absolute fantastic what you're giving to us !!! Thank you so much !
priceless pure an simple, cheers m8

Thanks for this great Compilation. I listen in the 80th in Berlin every week to Johns Music. I made some tapes this time, but the quality after 20 years is crasy. So I looked now for digital copies - but this - this is a lot of. One question. You write at some of the festive fiftys shows: Radioversion. Means this that you compiled the other shows from records. I love to get some background-infos about making the records.
Thanks again

This is just amazing- you are to be knighted for this- thanks so much-words cant really do justice for how appreciative I am ..in the words of Terry Tibbs "much love"
Peace to you and yours -Merry Christmas.

Thank you very much, 1PirateMike
Gorgeous stuff this is. I am looking forward to compilations DA - Z. Living in Germany means suffering from very bad radio program (all target group oriented for the 14-25yo). Blessed be John Peel!
Who ever you are, what a tribute to John Peel.  A work of art, a work of love.
There are so many great sessions on here, is all of this torrent still going? It looks incredible, thanks for uploading this.

Hey Mr PIRATE MIKE !!!
Everything's said already- I find no more words to express my THANKS for this work you've done to hold up the Memory of one of the MOST IMPORTANT MEN in the whole Music-Business of the last 40 years, Mr. JOHN PEEL, whom we sadly miss.
I'd like to get a glimpse of the shows, he's now performing with all the great musicians with him in heavenly dimensions...
Best wishes from Germany, so long
Hans-Helmut
OMG.... This is comming down at 800k. Cheers 1PirateMike and the lovely seeders out there.
Incredible torrent this is music!! Many thanks.

PirateMike - fab stuff. Do you still have compilations 4-8 and 10? Looking for some specific Peel Sessions
Thanks
